entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:06 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: E 21 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow at times heavy beginning after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming east 20 after midnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain or drizzle in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
